title: Mi Po
description: An emergency situation building resident system

App.title: Mi Po
App.description: An emergency situation building resident system

Auth.description: Join a group or create a new one,
Auth.existingGroup: If you disconnected by mistake you can log in to your existing group
Auth.enterPhoneNumber: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code
Auth.enterVerificationCode: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your phone

CreateUser.phoneStepDescription: Enter your phone number to get started
CreateUser.canRequestNewCode: You can request a new code

JoinGroup.joinStepDescription: Enter your details to join a group
JoinGroup.canRequestNewCode: You can request a new code

LoginUser.canRequestNewCode: You can request a new code

GroupsDashboard.title: My Groups
GroupsDashboard.noGroups: You're not part of any groups yet
GroupsDashboard.noGroupsDescription: Create a new group to get started

GroupCreate.title: Create New Group
GroupCreate.description: Set up a new group for your building or family
GroupCreate.selectGroupType: Select the type of group you want to create
GroupCreate.buildingDescription: For apartment buildings, condos, or residential properties
GroupCreate.familyDescription: For family members and close relatives

GroupPage.noResidents: No residents found. Invite people to join your group!

GroupHeader.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete your group and remove all members.
GroupHeader.deleteConfirmation: To confirm, type "{groupName}" in the box below:
GroupHeader.leaveConfirmation: To confirm, type "{groupName}" in the box below:
GroupHeader.leaveGroupWarning: Are you sure you want to leave this group? You will no longer be able to access group resources and will need to be invited again.

InviteDialog.title: Invite to Group
InviteDialog.qrCodeDescription: Scan this QR code to join the group
InviteDialog.shareCodeDescription: Share this code for manual entry on the join page

Tooltips.phoneNumberCreate: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code via SMS. This will be used to verify your identity as the group owner.
Tooltips.phoneNumberLogin: Enter the phone number associated with your account to receive a verification code
Tooltips.phoneNumberJoin: Providing your phone number allows for SMS verification and enhanced security. This is optional but recommended
Tooltips.verificationCode: Enter the 6-digit verification code that was sent to your phone number via SMS
Tooltips.verificationCodeLogin: Enter the 6-digit verification code that was sent to your phone number
Tooltips.yourName: Your display name that will be shown to other residents in the group. Maximum 20 characters
Tooltips.yourNameLogin: Enter your display name as it appears in the group
Tooltips.groupName: The name of your group or property. This will be used to identify your group to other residents. Maximum 20 characters
Tooltips.groupInviteCode: The unique invitation code provided by the group owner. This code allows you to join the specific group
Tooltips.groupInviteCodeLogin: Enter your group's invite code to identify which group you belong to
Tooltips.additionalDetailsCreate: Any additional information about yourself or the group that you'd like to share with other residents. This field is optional
Tooltips.additionalDetailsJoin: Any additional information about yourself that you'd like to share with other residents in the group. This field is optional
